title: Voidslime

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the end of each night, before actions are processed, you will be provided with a list of all effects that would happen. You may choose up to one of them. It doesn't happen.
- You have 12 hours to make your decision after actions are processed.
- You may not share the information you receive.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose the game.

desc:
Post 385
*It is technically an ooze, but its lifespan measures only seconds. In that short time, its appetite for magic is extraordinary.*
